label: 源順
本: The Pursuit of Loneliness: Chinese and Japanese Nature Poetry in Medieval Japan, ca. 1050-1150 . Franz Steiner Verlag Stuttgart . 1995
説明文: (911-983). Comp. dictionary, Wamyō ruijūshō, and Gosenshū. Compositions in Honchō monzui (32). Kanshi in Wakan rōeishū 和漢朗詠集 (30), Shinsen rōeishū 新撰朗詠集(12), Sakumon daitai (1), and Wakan kensakushū (6). Private waka collection Shitagau shū. Waka in several collections. [和名類聚抄、後撰集、本朝文粋、漢詩、作文大体、和漢兼作集、和歌、順集]
